mapper.select: SELECT M.MOIM_ID AS moimId ,M.MOIM_TITLE AS moimTitle ,M.MOIM_INFO AS moimInfo ,M.MOIM_LIMIT AS moimLimit ,L.LOCATION_NAME AS locationName ,M.MOIM_IMAGE_PATH AS moimImagePath ,M.LOCATION_ID AS locationId FROM MOIM M JOIN LOCATIONS L ON M.LOCATION_ID = L.LOCATION_ID WHERE M.MOIM_ID = #{id}
